Test package¶

Submodules¶

Test.test_Analysis module¶

Test.test_Analysis.testAnalysis()[source]¶

Run several tests to check if Analysis works correct

Test if accuracy of CNN is higher then accuracy of baseline Test if accuracy of CNN is higher or equal to the expected accuracy of hypothesis Test if generation and saving of confusion matrix works

Test.test_Database module¶

Test.test_Database.test_load_data_shape()[source]¶

Test if the keras training and test datasets have the expected shapes

Test.test_Database.test_load_data_shape_local()[source]¶

Test if the local training and test datasets have the expected shapes

Test.test_Database.test_test_data_not_corrupted()[source]¶

Test if the test data are not corrupted

Test.test_Database.test_test_data_path()[source]¶

Test if the path to the test data exist

Test.test_Database.test_test_label_not_corrupted()[source]¶

Test if the test label are not corrupted

Test.test_Database.test_test_label_path()[source]¶

Test if the path to the test label exist

Test.test_Database.test_train_data_not_corrupted()[source]¶

Test if the train data are not corrupted

Test.test_Database.test_train_data_path()[source]¶

Test if the path to the train data exist

Test.test_Database.test_train_label_not_corrupted()[source]¶

Test if the train labels are not corrupted

Test.test_Database.test_train_label_path()[source]¶

Test if the path to the train label exist

Test.test_Preprocessor module¶

Test.test_Preprocessor.test_preprocessing()[source]¶

Test if the shapes of the original MNIST and the preprocessed datasets are correct

Test.test_Processor.test_processor()[source]¶

Test if the processor runs and returns expected values
